example.eg: Chicago is between New York and Los Angeles.
example.egtrans: 芝加哥位于纽约和洛杉矶之间。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 在…中间，介于…之间, 在…中间，在…之间

example.eg: There is a bridge between the two shores.
I'm trying to decide between the red car and the blue one.
example.egtrans: 我正尽量在红车和蓝车之间选一个。

example.eg: We're going to split the bill between the two of us.
example.egtrans: 一会儿我们俩平分账单。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 在…之间（分享、承担）, 与…平分

example.eg: I picked my way between the tourists, looking for a good spot to have lunch.
example.egtrans: 我在熙熙攘攘的游客中穿梭，想找一个吃午饭的地方。

example.eg: It's not always easy to distinguish between right and wrong.
example.egtrans: 要区分对与错并非总是易事。

example.eg: Let's keep this information between you and me.
example.egtrans: 这件事仅有你我知情，不要让第三人知晓。

example.eg: To him, everything was black or white.  There was nothing between.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 在中间, 介乎二者之间

example.eg: Between the heat and the humidity, it's uncomfortable now.
We only have ten euros between us.
A brick wall came between the wooden building and the store.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 出现在…之间, 隔开, 分隔

example.eg: We are such good friends that nothing can come between us.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 离间, 伤害…之间的关系

dsense.name: aged from [sth] to [sth], aged between [sth] and [sth]

example.eg: This program is designed for young people aged from 18 to 25.
In some spas, people alternate between hot and cold baths.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 时而...时而..., 在...和...中交替进行

example.eg: It's very busy backstage between acts, what with all the costume and scenery changes.
You'd better do a lot of work between now and then.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 从现在到未来某时这段时间

example.eg: Eleanor only had enough time between periods to walk to her next class.

dsense.name: between the devil and the deep blue sea, between a rock and a hard place, between Scylla and Charybdis

trans_examp.trans_cn: 处于两难境地, 左右为难

dsense.name: between you and me, between ourselves

example.eg: Between you and me, I think Stella has fallen in love with him.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 你知我知, 不要告诉别人

example.eg: I couldn't decide between the two dresses, so I bought both.
example.egtrans: 我因为无法从两条裙子中做出抉择，所以两个都买了。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 从…和…中抉择, 从…和…中选定

example.eg: It can be hard to differentiate between a severe panic attack and a heart attack.
It's hard to discriminate between the individual cells.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 区别, 区分, 辨别

example.eg: The shortest distance between two points is a straight line.
I can't distinguish between the black and the dark brown.
We can draw a parallel between restrictions on law making powers of the earliest British Parliaments, and that of the modern European Parliament.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 在...和...之间找到相似之处

dsense.name: drive a wedge between [sb], drive a wedge between [sb] and [sb]

example.eg: I can't help feeling that your mother is trying to drive a wedge between us.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 在...和...间作梗, 在...和...间挑拨离间

example.eg: Scientists have been able to establish a connection between smoking and lung cancer.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 两头落空, 鸡飞蛋打

example.eg: These days, public telephone boxes are few and far between.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 罕见的, 寥寥无几的

dsense.name: fine line between [sth] and [sth], a fine line between [sth] and [sth]

example.eg: There's a fine line between genius and insanity.
example.egtrans: 天才和疯子间只有一线之隔。

example.eg: He acted as a go-between between the government and private arms dealers.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 媒人，红娘, 中介，中间人, 中介，中间机构

example.eg: The houses are next to one another, with an alleyway running in between.
example.egtrans: 这些房子一栋挨着一栋，中间有一条小巷。

example.eg: When they started to fight, their little brother ran in between.
example.egtrans: 他们开始打架时，他们的弟弟介入其中。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 到中间, 介入到中间

example.eg: Our house is in between a pub on one side and open fields on the other.
example.egtrans: 我们的房子一边是酒吧，另一边是开阔的田野。

example.eg: Your teens are an in-between time; you're no longer a child, but not yet an adult.
example.egtrans: 青少年时期属于中间时段，你不再是孩子了，但却又不是成年人。

example.eg: Just between us, I think her nose job was a big mistake.
This is just between us: don't tell anyone!

trans_examp.trans_cn: 别告诉别人, 你知我知

example.eg: His speech sounded positive, but if you read between the lines it was actually quite pessimistic.
I was sandwiched between two sumo wrestlers on that flight!  The host sandwiched me between two bankers at the dinner table and they just kept talking across me about investments.
example.egtrans: 那次飞行途中，我被夹在两个相扑运动员中间！晚餐桌上，主人将我安排在两名银行家中间，那两个人一直越过我大谈投资。

example.eg: She could not see the difference between the identical twins.
You need to strike a happy balance between video games and homework.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 在…之间达成平衡, 在两者之间找到折中

dsense.name: toggle between [sth]
dsense.guideword: (computing: switch views, programs, etc.) (计算机程序、视图等)

example.eg: Tania toggles between tabs, trying to track down the perfect translation.

dsense.name: yo-yo, yo-yo between [sth] and [sth]
dsense.guideword: figurative, informal (fluctuate, go back and forth)

example.eg: I seem to spend my time yo-yoing between depression and anger.
